text.div:
LinkIdTextCardinalityTypeDescription & Constraints
ClinicalResponseDischargeOrSevenDaysQuestionnairehttps://molic-avc.gabriellesantosleandro.com/Questionnaire/ClinicalResponseDischargeOrSevenDays#0.0.0
General-Information-ClinicalGeneral information.1..1group
Patient-IDWhat is the patient's identification?1..1string
FullName-ClinicalWhat is the patient's full name?1..1string
Treatment-Care-RelatedTreatment/Care Related.1..1group
Disdate-AcuteDate of discharge from acute care hospital.1..1date
Rehab-InDid the acute inpatient care include dedicated stroke rehabilitation?1..1codingValue Set: Yes, No and Unknown
Rehab-OutDid the post-acute care include dedicated stroke rehabilitation?1..1codingValue Set: Yes, No and Unknown
DischDestWhat type of place was the patient discharged to?1..1codingValue Set: Discharge Location
Treatment-VariablesTreatment Variables1..1group
TrombolytictxIndicate if the patient received intravenous thrombolytic therapy.1..1codingValue Set: Yes, No and Unknown
ThrombolytictxDateDate of thrombolytic therapy. (Only if the patient received intravenous thrombolytic therapy).0..1date
ThrombecttxIndicate if the patient underwent a thrombectomy.1..1codingValue Set: Yes, No and Unknown
ThrombecttxDateDate of Thrombectomy. (Only if the patient underwent a thrombectomy).0..1date
HemicranitxIndicate if the patient underwent hemicraniectomy.1..1codingValue Set: Yes, No and Unknown
HemicranitxDateDate of Hemocraniectomy. Only if the patient underwent hemicraniectomy.0..1date
ProcoagreversaltxIndicate if the patient received Procoagulant Reversal Therapy.1..1codingValue Set: Yes, No and Unknown
ProcoagreversaltxDateDate of Procoagulant Reversal Therapy. Only if the patient received Procoagulant Reversal Therapy.0..1date
SympichIndicate if the patient developed symptomatic intracerebral hemorrhage after treatment of ischemic stroke with intravenous thrombolysis and/or thrombectomy.1..1codingValue Set: Yes, No and Unknown
Survival-Disease-ControlSurvival and Disease Control.1..1group
VitalStatusIndicate if the person has deceased, regardless of cause.1..1codingValue Set: Yes, No and Unknown
DeceasedDateThe date of death of the person. Only the patient has deceased.0..1date
Clinician-Reported-Health-StatusClinician Reported Health Status.1..1group
SMRSQIndicate the degree of disability or dependence by obtaining the Simplified Modified Rankin Scale Questionnaire (smRSq).1..1codingValue Set: Simplified modified Ranking Scale questionnaire (SMRSq)

Documentation for this format

name: ClinicalResponseDischargeOrSevenDays
title: Clinical Response Questionnaire 02 - Discharge or 7 days post admission

item.text: General information.
What is the patient's identification?
What is the patient's full name?
Treatment/Care Related.
Date of discharge from acute care hospital.
Did the acute inpatient care include dedicated stroke rehabilitation?
Did the post-acute care include dedicated stroke rehabilitation?
What type of place was the patient discharged to?
Treatment Variables
Indicate if the patient received intravenous thrombolytic therapy.
Date of thrombolytic therapy. (Only if the patient received intravenous thrombolytic therapy).
Indicate if the patient underwent a thrombectomy.
Date of Thrombectomy. (Only if the patient underwent a thrombectomy).
Indicate if the patient underwent hemicraniectomy.
Date of Hemocraniectomy. Only if the patient underwent hemicraniectomy.
Indicate if the patient received Procoagulant Reversal Therapy.
Date of Procoagulant Reversal Therapy. Only if the patient received Procoagulant Reversal Therapy.
Indicate if the patient developed symptomatic intracerebral hemorrhage after treatment of ischemic stroke with intravenous thrombolysis and/or thrombectomy.
Survival and Disease Control.
Indicate if the person has deceased, regardless of cause.
The date of death of the person. Only the patient has deceased.
Clinician Reported Health Status.

code.display: No significant disability despite symptoms; able to carry out all usual duties and activities.
Slight disability; unable to carry out all previous activities but able to look after own affairs without assistance.
Moderate disability; requiring some help, but able to walk without assistance.
Moderately severe disability; unable to walk without assistance and unable to attend to own bodily needs without assistance.
Severe disability; bedridden, incontinent and requiring constant nursing care and attention.

item.text: Indicate the degree of disability or dependence by obtaining the Simplified Modified Rankin Scale Questionnaire (smRSq).
